remarks: The value of the algorithm iterator ` R ` at ` ( K + 1 ) ` . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 31-Mar-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)
statement:
algrf.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
algrf.2 $e |- R = seq M ( ( F o. 1st ) , ( Z X. { A } ) ) $.
algrf.3 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
algrf.4 $e |- ( ph -> A e. S ) $.
algrf.5 $e |- ( ph -> F : S --> S ) $.
algrp1 $p |- ( ( ph /\ K e. Z ) -> ( R ` ( K + 1 ) ) = ( F ` ( R ` K ) ) ) $.
